info.name: Nightmare's Augury Trail
info.description: Nightmare's Augury Trail (Nightmare Predator's) for Madwalker class from Tanares RPG
info.author: Dragori Games

description.p: Madwalkers that follow this path have delved into darkness, seeking the strength of the Watchers, natural enemies of all other Penumbral creatures, so they can gain power to destroy them. By taking the heart of one of Augur’s Watchers, they have unlocked the energies of the Penumbral Plane, transforming themselves into twisted beings of immense power. Though the Watchers regard them as mere nuisances, these Madwalkers relish their newfound might.

With their senses attuned to Augur’s powers of vision and dark prophecy, these Madwalkers move through the shadows with sinister intent. Their intuition predicts future events with eerie accuracy, and they can see what no other mortal can perceive.

Their transformation is a grotesque and horrifying spectacle, turning them into floating creatures of writhing tentacles and spikes, covered in sinister scales, with a massive mouth filled with serrated teeth that feed on the pain and suffering of their victims. Their minds become even more twisted and focused in this state, consumed by thoughts of domination and control.

Some of these Madwalkers struggle against their nature, seeking to use their power for good, but others succumb to their darkest desires, using their might to oppress and dominate others. Nevertheless, many of these dark beings have turned their eyes towards heroism, using their fearsome abilities to fight against the very darkness that empowers them.

Their very presence strikes fear in the hearts of their enemies, and their power is unmatched. They pay a terrible price for it, but they do not regret their path, as they continue to grow stronger, becoming even more powerful as they move through the penumbra with their newfound abilities.

As a madwalker of the Nightmare’s Augury Trail, you have access to a range of Aberrant Mutations unique to this subclass, acquired at 2nd, 5th, 9th, 13rd, and 17th levels of madwalker. Upon gaining each of these levels, you may choose one of the available Aberrant Mutations, and it does not count toward the number of Aberrant Mutations known.

tr.td: Eye of Augury, Phantom of Penumbra

description.p: At the 2nd level, your terrifying dreams reveal twisted pieces of your future, enabling you to brace for impending dangers. After completing a long rest, you can select ‘even’ or ‘odd’. Until your next long rest, whenever you receive damage from an attack and the attack roll’s natural result matches your selection, you have resistance to all damage from that attack, except in case of a critical hit.

Additionally, at 5th level, you gain the ability to foresee your potential demise. If you take damage substantial enough to drop you to 0 hit points, you can use your reaction to spend any number of Hit Dice, instantly regaining hit points before the damage is applied, potentialy preventing your hit points from dropping to 0.

description.p: Starting at 2nd level, you have access to penumbral shapes exclusive to the Nightmare’s Augury Trail (see madwalker’s penumbral shapes). Additionally, when you assume a Penumbral Shape exclusive to the Nightmare’s Augury Trail, you also replace your Wisdom with the Wisdom of the Penumbral Shape.

sheet.description: When you assume a Penumbral Shape exclusive to the Nightmare’s Augury Trail, you also replace your Wisdom with the Wisdom of the Penumbral Shape.

description.p: At 7th level, while conscious, you can uphold a psychic protective shield. As long as this shield is active, any damage you sustain from an attack is reduced by an amount equal to your Wisdom modifier (before applying any resistances, vulnerabilities, and other effects).
In addition, when you make a saving throw, you can use your reaction to augment the roll with your Wisdom modifier.

description.p: At the 14th level, you gain immunity to psychic damage and a flying speed equivalent to your walking speed, along with the hover property.
In addition, you can telepathically speak to any creatures within 90 feet of you that can understand at least one language, even if you do not share a common language.

As a bonus action, you can employ this ability to mimic the effects of the detect thoughts spell. If the creature is unwilling, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your Aberrant Mutation’s save DC to resist both the communication and the thought-reading ability.

sheet.description: You can hover. You can telepathically speak to any creatures within 90 feet of you that can understand at least one language, even if you do not share a common language. If the creature is unwilling, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your Aberrant Mutation’s save DC to resist both the communication and the thought-reading ability.

description.p: At 18th level, you can predict the near future and modify it. You can impose advantage or disadvantage on any roll you make, or that an ally or enemy in your line of sight makes, a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier, regaining all uses after a long rest.
